mutants.code:
def survive_walkers(t, walkers_distances):
    results = []
    for i in range(t):
        N = len(walkers_distances[i])
        A = sorted(walkers_distances[i])
        index = 1
        minute = 1
        myR = 1
        while index < N:
            if minute > A[index]:
                results.append(f'Goodbye Rick\n{index}')
                break
            if myR % 6 == 0:
                minute += 1
                myR = 0
            myR += 1
            minute += 1
            index += 1
        if index >= N:
            results.append('Rick now go and save Carl and Judas')
    return results

    return results
